title: Piracy Wiki Entry Missing or Deleted
content:
If anyone happens to have a copy of the former wiki entry for [What can I do to combat piracy?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220034/http:/typophile.com/wiki/What%252Bcan%252BI%252Bdo%252Bto%252Bcombat%252Bpiracy%25253F) I’d like a copy of it so we can fix that. I have a hunch someone decided to remove it.

 [‹ Anyone Hate Goudy Old Style?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220034/http:/typophile.com/node/38988 "Go to previous forum topic") [Is this wrong and sick? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220034/http:/typophile.com/node/38900 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content: Leave a ninja on guard next time.

If you know when it was live you could look here: [http://web.archive.org/web/\*/http://typophile.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111220034/http:/web.archive.org/web/*/http:/typophile.com "http://web.archive.org/web/\*/http://typophile.com")

tiff, sorry i didn’t tell you this earlier, but i think i created this as a blank link intending to come back and do something with it later. i’m not sure it ever really existed (that i can remember). sorry :^p
